Issue.description: NewOrgContext -> NewSession * NewSession -> NewSystemClient or NewChannelClient * NewSDK will allow optional factories for creation of providers and clients Follow-on activities: * With the above structure, a credential manager and cacheing of peer discovery can later be added to the org context. * Higher level interfaces should be exposed in the SDK package (fabapi) that encourage creation of new instances when parameters are changed (such as the peer list), rather than getters/setters. >
